sentence.Network_en: Local feeling does not necessarily concur with the press.
sentence.Network_cn: 当地人的感受未必与媒体一致。

sentence.Network_en: I concur with the speaker in condemning what has been done.
sentence.Network_cn: 我同意发言者对所做的事加以谴责.

sentence.Network_en: Butler and Stone concur that the war threw people's lives into a moral relief.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴特勒和斯通一致认为这场战争使人们的生命得到了道义上的解脱。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... concrete adj. 具体的；n.水泥 concur v. 同意；同时发生 concurrence n. 一致.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... curriculum v 课程（表） concur a 同时发生 concurrent v 同时的；共同的.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... concrete 具体存在的；n.混凝土 concur 意见相同，一致 concussion 脑震荡；强烈震动.
dissonance←→concordconcur vi. 意见相同,一致,互助to act together to a common end or single effect

list.abs: this summer two weeks of rain concurred with our vacation ., 今年 , 我们两个星期的假期里每天都下雨.
concur-英汉词典-英中字典-速译通-解释意思... ... concurring opinion {n.}并存意见 concurring vote {n.}同意票.
clinical assessment of dynamic concur tonometer ., 动态轮廓眼压计的临床应用.
第二是部分法官的并存意见(concurring opinion)，提出并存意见的法官虽然赞成多数派法官的判决意见，但是提出不同的推论或理由。
... at 762 (克拉克法官持同意意见).译者注，同意意见（concurring opinion）指支持判决结果的意见，异议意见（dissenting opinion） …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the senses 'collide' and 'act in combination'): from Latin concurrere 'run together, assemble in crowds', from con- 'together with' + currere 'to run'

entry.def: If one person concurs with another person, the two people agree. You can also say that two people concur .

example.ex: Local feeling does not necessarily concur with the press...
example.tran: 当地人的感受未必与媒体一致。

example.ex: Daniels and Franklin concurred in an investigator's suggestion that the police be commended...
example.tran: 丹尼尔斯和富兰克林一致同意一位调查人员的建议，即警方应该受到赞扬。

means.word_mean: 1. be in accord; be in agreement;

sentences.sentence: "We agreed on the terms of the settlement"
"I hold with those who say life is sacred"

auth_sentence.content: I concur with the state autopsy and their findings.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I concur with the state autopsy and their findings.

auth_sentence.res_content: This investment also marks the entry of Concur into India.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This investment also marks the entry of Concur into India.

auth_sentence.content: Studies of corporate boards and federal judges concur.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Studies of corporate boards and federal judges concur.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =run,表示"跑,发生,快速做……"; 2. =care,表示"关心"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正确无误的;准确的,精确的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac再+cur关心+ate……的→再关心,弄精确为止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好奇的, 求知的, 古怪的, 爱挑剔的

stems_affixes.word_buile: accurate[[adj.正确无误的;准确的,精确的]]→n.准确[性];精确;准确度
cur关心+io→珍贵的被人多加关心的东西
cur关心+iosity多……的状态→关心多→好奇心
con共同+cur跑,发生,快速做……→共同跑→共同发生
in进入+cur跑,发生,快速做……→跑进来→招惹

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现;存在;想起,想到
stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向+cur跑,发生,快速做……→某个方向跑,发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: [尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再次+cur跑,发生,快速做……→再次跑来

means.word_mean: 同意, 赞同, 表示一致意见

sentences.en: The two judges concurred on the ruling.
sentences.cn: 两名法官对这个判决意见一致。

sentences.en: So many things concurred to give rise to the problem.
sentences.cn: 许多事情同时发生而导致了这一问题。
